member.name: M:OCLSharp.OpenCL.Program.OpenCLFunctions.get_global_offset(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the offset values specified in global_work_offset argument to clEnqueueNDRangeKernel. Valid values of dimindx are 0 to get_work_dim() - 1. For other values, get_global_offset() returns 0. For clEnqueueTask, this returns 0.
